Domaine de la Romanee-Conti has its Romanee-Conti vineyard - only 43 acres out of a total 70. Mount Veeder has its Side Hill Ranch- only 12 acres out of a total 22. These bull's-eye areas are the ‘creme de la creme.’

Only 140 cases of Hill Side Ranch are produced a year - probably the best Cabernet of California - and only 50 cases will reach us during early 1980.
